question: Question_01_(b)
statement:
Consider the matrix $\displaystyle A$ and column vector
$\displaystyle \vec{b}$.

$\displaystyle A = \begin{bmatrix} 
1 & 1 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 \\ 2 & 3 & 4
\end{bmatrix}$ and $\displaystyle \vec{b} = \begin{bmatrix} 
1 \\ 2 \\ 3
\end{bmatrix}$

Recall that the $\displaystyle PA=LU$ factorization can be used to
rewrite the system $\displaystyle A\vec{x} = \vec{b}$ as two systems
with triangular coefficient matrix. Write down these two triangular
systems.
